'''Father Michael''' is the priest brought in to counsel [[Justin Davidson]].

==History==
When [[Justin Davidson]] was struggling with wanting to die after his heart transplant, his mother had Father Michael come to speak to him. Father Michael spoke to him about how God wanted him to have the heart, but it was ineffective because Justin said he doesn't believe in God.

==Career==
He is a priest.
